name: Hotel Playa

reviews.title: Value for money
reviews.text: Small friendly hotel in an excellent position for beach, cafes and shops. Larger than average room with balcony, very clean and good breakfast. Staff made a lovely cup of coffee! Would certainly go back.

description: A comfortable, family run quality hotel, Hotel Playa has recently been renovated. It is beautifully located in a privileged position, 50 mt from the seaside and from the renowned promenade of Viareggio, an ideal meeting place with its sophisticated boutiques and stylish resorts.
